titleStmt.title: The declaration of the kingdomes of Scotland and England joyned in armes for the vindication and defence of their religion, liberties, and lawes against the popish, prelaticall, and malignant party / by the Honourable Convention of the Estates of Scotland and the Honourable Houses of the Parliament of England.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
